nodes.text: A neural wave relaxer helmet first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, which was released on December 15, 2017. The prop was not named in the film, but received identification in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in conjunction with the film. The helmet was included in a concept art piece of Sommover titled "King 12" that was created by creature concept designer and senior sculptor Ivan Manzella.
